meanings.definition: A cold cut made from the head of a pig or calf, typically set in gelatin.
meanings.sent1: At the deli, they displayed various headcheeses in the chilled section.
meanings.sent2: The butcher recommended trying the headcheeses for a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The picnic guests were surprised to see headcheeses wobbling in the gelatin.
meanings.sent4: The headcheeses looked like a jiggly mosaic of meat and fat.
meanings.sent5: The headcheeses were as wobbly as a bowl of jelly.
